PATIENT_REGISTRATION_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Please enter a valid 12-character Medicare card number along with the patient ID to start the registration process.
PATIENT_REGISTRATION_EMAIL_PASSWORD_DESC: Please add a valid email and password.
PATIENT_REGISTRATION_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTIO: Please choose the primary language of choice for Opal.
PATIENT_REGISTRATION_CELLPHONE_DESCRIPTI: Please assign a cellphone number in a 10-digit format (no hyphens).
PATIENT_REGISTRATION_SECURITY_QUESTION_D: Please choose three distinct security questions and answer them.
STATUS_SSN_ERROR: SSN must be greater than 12 characters
STATUS_PASSWORD_CAP_NUM_ERROR: Password must contain at least one capital letter and at least one number
SLA_CHECK_DESCRIPTION: Patient has read the service level agreement?
OPAL_DOCUMENTATION_CHECK_DESCRIPTION: Patient has received the Opal documentation?
FINAL_CHECKS_DESCRIPTION: Please perform these final checks before registering the patient.
ACCESS_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION: Please specify medical record access level.
